Okay, Let's start fresh! What can I help you with?
Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
my ads stuck under review more then 72 hours

I'm sorry to hear that your ads have been stuck under review for more than 72 hours. Could you please provide me with the following details so I can assist you better?
1. Is this a new account?
2. Have there been any recent changes to your ad campaign?
Once I have this information, I'll be able to guide you on the next steps.

Thank you for the information. Since your account is new and hasn't been verified yet, you'll need to provide some details for the verification process. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification and include the following information:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.

Okay, Let's start fresh! What can I help you with?
Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Hi Nabil, I'm sorry to hear that your ads have been stuck under review for more than 72 hours. The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes even earlier thanks to our awesome Ad Ops team! Since it's been longer than usual, I recommend checking out the ad policy and standards document for any potential issues that might be causing the delay. You can find it here: [Ad Policy and Standards](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/sections/24753741763085-Ad-Policy-and-Standards). If you need further assistance, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your ad details.
